example.text: WATCH: Twitter and 2020 Election Interference What Twitter and other Big Tech companies did in 2020 with respect to censorship was as much an outrage then as it is today. Simply put, what they did is expected of communist China, not the United States of America.

Our bill will help communities in Iowa and across the country prevent and handle any surge in opioid overdoses. I urge President Biden to sign this bipartisan legislation into law quickly to help prevent cases of opioid overdose and addiction.

Quick Links This week, the US House of Representatives passed my bipartisan bill to prevent opioid addiction, overdoses and deaths in rural communities. This is a critical step forward in our ongoing effort to curb the opioid crisis.
